locations.name: Bahen 1F
locations.brief_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center.
locations.long_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. It's usually crowded at this time of the day, but today it's eerily quiet. Only a few students are studying at the table near the doors. You better not disturb them. One student is rushing down the corridor, wearing a heavy-looking backpack and carrying a textbook in their arms. There are elevators to the West, and an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.

locations.name: Bahen 2F
locations.brief_description: You are on the second floor of the Bahen Center.
locations.long_description: You are on the second floor of the Bahen Center. It is even emptier up here... You start to hear the hum of the air conditioner. Oh! The CSSU Lounge!. The CSSU Lounge is located to the South, and there are elevators to the East.

locations.name: CSSU Lounge
locations.brief_description: You are in the CSSU Lounge.
locations.long_description: You made it to the CSSU Lounge. There is a fridge... The only way out is north.

locations.name: St. George Street
locations.brief_description: You are on St. George Street
locations.long_description: You are on St. George Street. It's pretty windy day...  Thankfully you brought your jacket! You hear the bustling noise of the city.

items.name: toonie
items.description: There is a toonie on the ground. Someone must have dropped it.

items.name: crumpled paper
items.description: There's some crumpled paper. Seems like someone didn't want to do their homework...
